item.title: Melody add a quote by Deborah Reber
item.description: "Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself." -- Deborah Reber

item.title: Melody add a quote by William Arthur Ward, college administrator, writer (1921-1994)
item.description:
"Another fresh new year is here . . . Another year to live! To banish worry, doubt, and fear, To love and laugh and give!
This bright new year is given me To live each day with zest . . . To daily grow and try to be My highest and my best!
I have the opportunity Once more to right some wrongs, To pray for peace, to plant a tree, And sing more joyful songs!" -- William Arthur Ward, college administrator, writer (1921-1994)

item.title: Melody add a quote by Nike Campbell-Fatoki
item.description: "We are the authors of our destinies. No one can see the vision any clearer, believe in and work any harder to make it a reality more than the visionary." -- Nike Campbell-Fatoki

item.title: Melody add a quote by Holly Black
item.description: "Clever as the Devil and twice as pretty." -- Holly Black
